title: Bandwidth
extract: Bandwidth or data usage is the total amount of data Ð such as images, movies, photos, videos and other files Ð that you send (upload) or receive (download) over a specific period of time. Regularly checking your bandwidth usage will help you become aware of what your average day-to-day network usagelooks like.
extract_html: Bandwidth or data usage is the total amount of data Ð such as images, movies, photos, videos and other files Ð that you send (upload) or receive (download) over a specific period of time. Regularly checking your bandwidth usage will help you become aware of what your average day-to-day network usagelooks like.
